description.value: This animated item attempts to catch you when you fall. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grab an Edge], even if your hands are tied behind your back or otherwise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained], so long as there's a solid edge within 10 feet. If you roll a success, you can Grab the Edge even if you don't have a hand free.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
